title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value should persist after modifying it. Specifically, after performing step 5, the OK button should be grayed out and the default value should still be set to "aaa" in the list box.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Locate the list box parameter.
3. Set the default value to "aaa".
4. Modify the default value.
5. Observe the behavior of the list box parameter.
6. Verify if the OK button is grayed out.
Expected result: The default value should persist after modifying it. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out and the default value should still be set to "aaa" in the list box.
